Operator type: 1
Number of sub-packets: 2 (00000000010)

Sub-packets:

00000000000000000101100001000101010110001011001000100000000010000100011000111000110100
000 000 0 000000000010110 0001000101010110001011 001000100000000010000100011000111000110100

Version: 0
Type: 0
Operator type: 0
Length bits: 22 = (16 + 4 + 2)  (000000000010110)
Body: 0001000101010110001011

0001000101010110001011
000 100 0 1010 10110001011

Version: 0
Type: 4 (Literal)
Value: 10 (0 1010)

10110001011
101 100 0 1011

Version: 5 (101)
Type: 4 (100) Literal
Value: 11 (1011)

Remainder:
001000100000000010000100011000111000110100
001 000 1 00000000010 000100011000111000110100

Version: 1
Type: 0
Operator type: 1
# Packets: 2

000100011000111000110100
000 100 0 1100 011 100 0 1101 00

Version: 0 (000)
Type: 4
Value: 12

Version: 3
Type: 4
Value: 13

Version count: 3 + 0 + 0 + 5 + 1 + 0 + 3 = 12
